channel.title: Client Not Running (Help) --- PATH NOT FOUND
channel.description:
Downloaded a great server, i click run on the client doesn't work - Specified path not found or whatever, this is whats in it when i click "edit" on the run.
@echo off Title runescape client @echo made by James cd bin start javaw -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 Pause

item.title: Client Not Running (Help) --- PATH NOT FOUND
item.dc:creator: @rawr_i_am_scary rawr i am scary
item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

Lol’d. it says “made by James” and you don’t even know how to set the path.

Obviously, the path to the jre/jdk isn’t found. So instead of “javaw” put in the path to the java program…

Read full topic
item.source: Client Not Running (Help) --- PATH NOT FOUND

item.title: Client Not Running (Help) --- PATH NOT FOUND
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Downloaded a great server, i click run on the client doesn’t work - Specified path not found or whatever, this is whats in it when i click “edit” on the run.

@echo off
Title runescape client
@echo made by James
cd bin
start javaw -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32
Pause
